title: Topic 001 Question 073
body: An organization is starting to move its infrastructure from its on-premises environment to Google Cloud Platform (GCP). The first step the organization wants to take is to migrate its ongoing data backup and disaster recovery solutions to GCP. The organization's on-premises production environment is going to be the next phase for migration to GCP. Stable networking connectivity between the on-premises environment and GCP is also being implemented.
Which GCP solution should the organization use?
options: BigQuery using a data pipeline job with continuous updates via Cloud VPN
Cloud Storage using a scheduled task and gsutil via Cloud Interconnect
Compute Engines Virtual Machines using Persistent Disk via Cloud Interconnect
Cloud Datastore using regularly scheduled batch upload jobs via Cloud VPN
